   20: 
   21: -module(ssl_cipher_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include("tls_record.hrl").
   27: -include("ssl_cipher.hrl").
   28: -include("ssl_record.hrl").
   29: 
   30: %% Callback functions
   31: -export([all/0,
   32:          groups/0,
   33:          init_per_suite/1,
   34:          end_per_suite/1,
   35:          init_per_group/2,
   36:          end_per_group/2,
   37:          init_per_testcase/2,
   38:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   39: 
   40: %% Testcases
   41: -export([aes_decipher_good/0,
   42:          aes_decipher_good/1,
   43:          aes_decipher_fail/0,
   44:          aes_decipher_fail/1,
   45:          padding_test/1,
   46:          sign_algorithms/1
   47:         ]).
   48: 
   49: 
   50: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   51: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   52: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   53: all() ->
   54:     [aes_decipher_good, aes_decipher_fail, padding_test, sign_algorithms].
   55: 
   56: groups() ->
   57:     [].
   58: 
   59: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   60:     try crypto:start() of
   61: 	ok ->
   62: 	    Config
   63:     catch _:_  ->
   64: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
   65:     end.
   66: 
   67: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   68:     ssl:stop(),
   69:     application:stop(crypto).
   70: 
   71: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   72:     Config.
   73: 
   74: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   75:     Config.
   76: 
   77: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   78:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 5}),
   79:     _ = application:load(ssl),
   80:     Previous = case logger:get_module_level(ssl) of
   81:                    [] -> notice;
   82:                    [{ssl,P}] -> P
   83:                end,
   84:     ok = logger:set_application_level(ssl, debug),
   85:     [{app_log_level, Previous}|Config].
   86: 
   87: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   88:     Previous = proplists:get_value(app_log_level, Config),
   89:     logger:set_application_level(ssl, Previous),
   90:     Config.
   91: 
   92: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   93: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
   94: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   95: aes_decipher_good() ->
   96:     [{doc,"Decipher a known cryptotext using a correct key"}].
   97: 
   98: aes_decipher_good(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   99:     HashSz = 32,
  100:     CipherState = correct_cipher_state(),
  101:     decipher_check_good(HashSz, CipherState, ?TLS_1_0),
  102:     decipher_check_good(HashSz, CipherState, ?TLS_1_1),
  103:     decipher_check_good(HashSz, CipherState, ?TLS_1_2).
  104: 
  105: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  106: aes_decipher_fail() ->
  107:     [{doc,"Decipher a known cryptotext using a incorrect key"}].
  108: 
  109: aes_decipher_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  110:     HashSz = 32,
  111:     CipherState = incorrect_cipher_state(),
  112:     decipher_check_fail(HashSz, CipherState, ?TLS_1_0),
  113:     decipher_check_fail(HashSz, CipherState, ?TLS_1_1),
  114:     decipher_check_fail(HashSz, CipherState, ?TLS_1_2).
  115: 
  116: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  117: padding_test(Config) when is_list(Config)  ->
  118:     HashSz = 16,
  119:     CipherState = correct_cipher_state(),
  120:     pad_test(HashSz, CipherState, ?TLS_1_0),
  121:     pad_test(HashSz, CipherState, ?TLS_1_1),
  122:     pad_test(HashSz, CipherState, ?TLS_1_2).
  123: 
  124: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  125: sign_algorithms(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  126:     [{sha256,rsa_pss_pss},{rsa,sha256}] = ssl_cipher:signature_schemes_1_2([rsa_pss_pss_sha256, {rsa, sha256}]).
  127: 
  128: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------    
  129: % Internal functions  --------------------------------------------------------
  130: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  131: decipher_check_good(HashSz, CipherState, Version) ->
  132:     {Content, _NextIV, Mac} = content_nextiv_mac(Version),
  133:     {Content, Mac, _} = 
  134: 	ssl_cipher:decipher(?AES_CBC, HashSz, CipherState, aes_fragment(Version), Version, true).
  135: 
  136: decipher_check_fail(HashSz, CipherState, Version) ->
  137:     {Content, NextIV, Mac} = content_nextiv_mac(Version),
  138:     true = {Content, Mac, #cipher_state{iv = NextIV}} =/= 
  139: 	ssl_cipher:decipher(?AES_CBC, HashSz, CipherState, aes_fragment(Version), Version, true).
  140: 
  141: pad_test(HashSz, CipherState, ?TLS_1_0 = Version) ->
  142:     %% 3.1 should have padding test, but may be disabled
  143:     {Content, NextIV, Mac} = badpad_content_nextiv_mac(Version),
  144:     BadCont = badpad_content(Content),
  145:     {Content, Mac, #cipher_state{iv = NextIV}} = 
  146: 	ssl_cipher:decipher(?AES_CBC, HashSz, CipherState, badpad_aes_fragment(?TLS_1_0) , ?TLS_1_0, false),
  147:     {BadCont, Mac, #cipher_state{iv = NextIV}} = 
  148: 	ssl_cipher:decipher(?AES_CBC, HashSz, CipherState, badpad_aes_fragment(?TLS_1_0), ?TLS_1_0, true);
  149: pad_test(HashSz, CipherState, Version) ->
  150:     %% 3.2 and 3.3 must have padding test
  151:     {Content, NextIV, Mac} = badpad_content_nextiv_mac(Version),
  152:     BadCont = badpad_content(Content),
  153:     {BadCont, Mac, #cipher_state{iv = NextIV}} = ssl_cipher:decipher(?AES_CBC, HashSz, CipherState, 
  154: 									      badpad_aes_fragment(Version), Version, false),
  155:     {BadCont, Mac, #cipher_state{iv = NextIV}} = ssl_cipher:decipher(?AES_CBC, HashSz, CipherState,  
  156: 								     badpad_aes_fragment(Version), Version, true).
  157:     
  158: aes_fragment(?TLS_1_0) ->
  159:     <<197,9,6,109,242,87,80,154,85,250,110,81,119,95,65,185,53,206,216,153,246,169,
  160:       119,177,178,238,248,174,253,220,242,81,33,0,177,251,91,44,247,53,183,198,165,
  161:       63,20,194,159,107>>;
  162: 	
  163: aes_fragment(_) ->
  164:     <<220,193,179,139,171,33,143,245,202,47,123,251,13,232,114,8,
  165:       190,162,74,31,186,227,119,155,94,74,119,79,169,193,240,160,
  166:       198,181,81,19,98,162,213,228,74,224,253,168,156,59,195,122,
  167:       108,101,107,242,20,15,169,150,163,107,101,94,93,104,241,165>>.
  168: 
  169: badpad_aes_fragment(?TLS_1_0) ->
  170:     <<186,139,125,10,118,21,26,248,120,108,193,104,87,118,145,79,225,55,228,10,105,
  171:       30,190,37,1,88,139,243,210,99,65,41>>;
  172: badpad_aes_fragment(_) ->
  173:     <<137,31,14,77,228,80,76,103,183,125,55,250,68,190,123,131,117,23,229,180,207,
  174:       94,121,137,117,157,109,99,113,61,190,138,131,229,201,120,142,179,172,48,77,
  175:       234,19,240,33,38,91,93>>.
  176: 
  177: content_nextiv_mac(?TLS_1_0) ->
  178:     {<<"HELLO\n">>,
  179:      <<72,196,247,97,62,213,222,109,210,204,217,186,172,184, 197,148>>,
  180:      <<71,136,212,107,223,200,70,232,127,116,148,205,232,35,158,113,237,174,15,217,192,168,35,8,6,107,107,233,25,174,90,111>>};
  181: content_nextiv_mac(_) ->
  182:     {<<"HELLO\n">>,
  183:      <<183,139,16,132,10,209,67,86,168,100,61,217,145,57,36,56>>,
  184:      <<71,136,212,107,223,200,70,232,127,116,148,205,232,35,158,113,237,174,15,217,192,168,35,8,6,107,107,233,25,174,90,111>>}.
  185: 
  186: badpad_content_nextiv_mac(?TLS_1_0) ->
  187:     {<<"HELLO\n">>,
  188:      <<225,55,228,10,105,30,190,37,1,88,139,243,210,99,65,41>>,
  189:       <<183,139,16,132,10,209,67,86,168,100,61,217,145,57,36,56>>
  190:     };
  191: badpad_content_nextiv_mac(_) ->
  192:     {<<"HELLO\n">>,
  193:      <<133,211,45,189,179,229,56,86,11,178,239,159,14,160,253,140>>,
  194:       <<183,139,16,132,10,209,67,86,168,100,61,217,145,57,36,56>>
  195:     }.
  196: 
  197: badpad_content(Content) ->
  198:     %% BadContent will fail mac test 
  199:     <<16#F0, Content/binary>>.
  200:   
  201: correct_cipher_state() ->
  202:     #cipher_state{iv = <<59,201,85,117,188,206,224,136,5,109,46,70,104,79,4,9>>,
  203: 		  key = <<72,196,247,97,62,213,222,109,210,204,217,186,172,184,197,148>>}.
  204: 
  205: incorrect_cipher_state() ->
  206:     #cipher_state{iv = <<59,201,85,117,188,206,224,136,5,109,46,70,104,79,4,9>>,
  207: 		  key = <<72,196,247,97,62,213,222,109,210,204,217,186,172,184,197,254>>}.
  208:
